archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0848
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Disclosure Manager/Analyst, I want to be able to identify the 'end user' of any service connection for which interception is required to by way of any identifier given by NZ Law Enforcement Agencies under statutory orders served, ensure that we are able to confirm that the correct individual is being intercepted by NZ Law Enforcement Agencies in conjunction with providing live evidential records to assist in either proving the criminal offending or innocence of customers who are using our services.

properties.value: For Comarch seems the same as REQ_BSS_0847

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
